thread.section_title: Gamecheap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamecheap | gamecheap.net | 4 of 68
thread.title: Richard Cook

author: Richard Cook
title: Richard Cook
text: Had problem activating the key on steam. I contacted Gamecheap and they sent 2 additional downloads..still nothing..I contacted them the next day and we tried other alternative..still nothing.. and I gave up! But they did not. They called me and worked until they got it running. THIS IS THE KIND OF COMPANY YOU WANT TO ORDER FROM. The price may be cheap but their service is TOP-NOTCH.
